TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OutputCache extends System.Object
public ref class OutputCache abstract sealed

summary.span: 可通过编程方式访问网站的配置文件中指定的输出缓存提供程序。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出缓存将生成的页面、控件和 HTTP 响应的输出存储在内存中。Output caching stores the generated output of pages, controls, and HTTP responses in memory. 使用输出缓存可以缓存不同版本的内容，具体取决于查询字符串、页面上的窗体发布参数、浏览器类型或用户的语言。Output caching enables you to cache different versions of content depending on the query string and on form-post parameters to a page, on browser type, or on the language of the user. 可以将 ASP.NET 配置为在特定时间段内缓存输出缓存项。You can configure ASP.NET to cache an output-cache entry for a specific period. 你还可以将 ASP.NET 配置为根据外部事件（如缓存所依赖的数据库中的更改）自动逐出缓存条目。You can also configure ASP.NET to evict a cache entry automatically based on an external event such as changes in the database that the cache depends on. 类可让你扩展输出缓存。The class enables you to extend output caching. 例如，你可以配置一个或多个自定义输出缓存提供程序，这些提供程序面向其他存储设备，如本地磁盘或远程磁盘、数据库、云存储和分布式缓存引擎。For example, you can configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string DefaultProviderName { get; }
.property string DefaultProviderName
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultProviderName As String
public: static property System::String ^ DefaultProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.DefaultProviderName : string

summary.span: 获取为输出缓存配置的默认提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the default provider that is configured for the output cache.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有 HTTP 响应、呈现的页面和控件都使用 `AspNetInternalProvider` 内存中输出缓存提供程序。By default, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use `AspNetInternalProvider`, the in-memory output cache provider. 若要使用不同的提供程序，请将 `defaultProvider` 属性设置为备用提供程序的名称。To use a different provider, set the `defaultProvider` attribute to the name of the alternative provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Deserialize (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
Public Shared Function Deserialize (stream As Stream) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Deserialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);
static member Deserialize : System.IO.Stream -> obj

summary.span: 将二进制对象反序列化为输出缓存数据。

span.span: Deserializes a binary object into output-cache data.

returns.span: 包含经过反序列化的数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the deserialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)] 此方法由在部分信任下操作的输出缓存提供程序使用。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 方法所返回的反序列化对象不是有效的输出缓存类型。

span.span: The deserialized object that is returned by the method is not a valid output-cache type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProviderCollection Providers { get; }
.property class System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProviderCollection Providers
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As OutputCacheProviderCollection
public: static property System::Web::Caching::OutputCacheProviderCollection ^ Providers { System::Web::Caching::OutputCacheProviderCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Providers : System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProviderCollection

summary.span: 获取网站的配置文件中指定的输出缓存提供程序的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

value.span: 所配置的提供程序的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置一个或多个自定义输出缓存提供程序，这些提供程序面向其他存储设备，如本地磁盘或远程磁盘、数据库、云存储和分布式缓存引擎。You configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices, such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines. 若要配置自定义输出缓存提供程序，请将提供程序添加到由属性表示的集合中 。To configure custom output-cache providers, you add a provider to the collection that is represented by the property.

summary.span: 将输出缓存数据序列化为二进制数据。

span.span: Serializes output-cache data into binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由在部分信任下操作的输出缓存提供程序使用。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 不是指定的输出缓存类型之一。

span.span: is not one of the specified output-cache types.
